conversation.message: I have followed your innovative work for some time, and it aligns perfectly with my career aspirations. I am highly motivated to contribute to your team's success and am formally submitting my application now.

- Seeker_E P1 is Company_C. (Company_D's Rank 2 candidate is applying elsewhere).

Since Seeker_C is acceptable (ranked 3rd) and Company_D has capacity 1, they must accept Seeker_C to fill their quota. This is the optimal strategy to secure P1 immediately.
